mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.created_at, o. STATUS, o.terminal_id FROM cs_returns o WHERE o.customer_id = #{customer_id} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC LIMIT #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.id, o.`status` AS apply_status, o.created_at AS apply_time, o.return_price, o.bank_name, o.bank_account, o.reason, t.serial_num, crm.content AS marks_content, crm.created_at AS marks_time, c.`name` AS marks_person FROM cs_returns o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON t.good_id = g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands gb ON g.good_brands_id = gb.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc ON t.pay_channel_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.id LEFT JOIN cs_return_marks crm ON o.id = crm.cs_return_id LEFT JOIN customers c ON crm.customer_id = c.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
